name: LOR White2 Classic Theme
description: Make new white2 theme of linux.org.ru looks a bit more classic.
additional_info:
1.3
* Fixed new buttons color.

1.2
* Fixed start color and fontstyle.

1.1
* Fixed visited links color.
* Text font typeface is serif again.

P.S. This user style is for "white2" theme only. You have to be logged in to select this theme.
